turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to place an order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to make a pizza order from the same pizzeria. It's called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I'm ordering for the kiddos, so I would like to have three small pizzas that are all thin-crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how about the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's see. On the first one, I would like to have extra cheese. What sort of meat toppings are available? Do you have a list?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is sausage, pepperoni, chicken, bacon and ham.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Put chicken on the first one with bacon and pineapple.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the second one, I would like that one to be light on the sauce and also light on the cheese. Can you add an additional type of cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what about the other 2 pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of cheese would you like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are my options?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you have Charter?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, they have cheddar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, good. I would like to add cheddar onto that one. And I would like that one to be a also a chicken pizza. But with mushrooms and.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Roma tomato if that's possible.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and green olives if that's possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they don't have roma tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have any tomato topping?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, just regular tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. That will work. Regular tomatoes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and how about the third pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third pizza, I would like that to be regular amount sauce, regular amount of cheese, double pepperoni. And is there any sort of additional like a spice topping that's not.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like a sprinkle of something.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Or is that not an option?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of sauce would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh no, not sauce. Add a spice topping like can you add a little bit of salt and pepper on to the top or a little bit of red crushed pepper?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, crushed pepper?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The crust on all three of them, I need that to be thin crust on pizza one, pizza two, and pizza three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so 3 small pizzas. Cheese, bacon and pineapple with extra cheese on the first one. On the second one chicken and mushrooms tomatoes and green olives, light on the sauce and cheese, with cheddar. on the third pizza, double pepperoni and crushed pepper. Thin crust on all three. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. Sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $35.78.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bella Luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, that will be all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy! byebye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
